医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
YAP 和 TAZ 蛋白指导子宫内骨骼发育一对蛋白质 YAP 和 TAZ 已被确定为子宫内骨骼发育的导体，可以提供对遗传性疾病的深入了解，例如成骨不全症（通常称为“脆骨病”）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240104/YAP-and-TAZ- Proteins-guide-bone-development-in-the-womb.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240104/YAP-and-TAZ- Proteins-guide-bone-development-in-the-womb.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=14a8e525-c55f-4d00-b5ac-d29ac4f0d9ab Thu, 04 Jan 2024 23:57:15 -0500 YAP and TAZ proteins guide bone development in the womb
研究：三分之二患有镰状细胞病的婴儿是生活在贫困地区的母亲所生似乎一开始就患有可能致残的遗传性血液病还不够，一项研究表明，几乎三分之二的患有镰状细胞病的婴儿都是生活在贫困地区的母亲所生。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240104/Study-Two-thirds-of-babies-with-sickle-cell-disease-are-born-to-mothers-living-in-disadvantages-areas。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240104/Study-Two-thirds-of-babies-with-sickle-cell-disease-are-born-to-mothers-living-in-disadvantages-areas。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c492de2d-215c-4056-8ca9-ec23da010a29 Thu, 04 Jan 2024 23:39:08 -0500 Study: Two-thirds of babies with sickle cell disease are born to mothers living in disadvantaged areas
双相情感障碍比吸烟更能缩短寿命患有双相情感障碍（一种可能导致躁狂和抑郁情绪的严重精神疾病）会让生活变得更具挑战性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240104/Bipolar-disorder-cuts-lives-short-more-than-smoking.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240104/Bipolar-disorder-cuts-lives-short-more-than-smoking.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=12d65e78-cdbc-460a-b31c-395034131a2e Thu, 04 Jan 2024 23:07:08 -0500 Bipolar disorder cuts lives short more than smoking
研究发现癫痫可能是导致儿童猝死的原因在一项旨在更好地了解幼儿突然、意外死亡（通常发生在睡眠期间）的研究中，研究人员发现短暂的癫痫发作并伴有肌肉抽搐是一个潜在原因。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240104/Seizures-may-be-responsible-for-some-sudden-deaths-in-children-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240104/Seizures-may-be-responsible-for-some-sudden-deaths-in-children-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a33ca76e-4a3c-4cd9-b79c-f8024f422a35 Thu, 04 Jan 2024 22:47:46 -0500 Seizures may be responsible for some sudden deaths in children, study finds
早期有针对性的肌肉神经支配可减轻截肢后的慢性疼痛美国官方医学杂志《整形与重建外科》一月号上的一项研究表明，在截肢时尽早进行一种称为靶向肌肉神经支配 (TMR) 的手术可以减轻疼痛评分并预防与异常神经再生相关的并发症。美国整形外科医生协会 (ASPS)。该期刊由威科集团 (Wolters Kluwer) 的 Lippincott 作品集出版。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240104/Early-targeted-muscle-reinnervation-cuts-chronic-pain-after-amputation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240104/Early-targeted-muscle-reinnervation-cuts-chronic-pain-after-amputation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=461e3e7c-7cb3-4df9-ae4a-4c142948a4e6 Thu, 04 Jan 2024 22:09:10 -0500 Early targeted muscle reinnervation cuts chronic pain after amputation
犹他州发现，大多数参加医疗补助“放松”的人从未尝试过续保对去年失去医疗补助覆盖范围的人进行的首次调查发现，超过一半的人没有努力更新他们的覆盖范围——在许多情况下，因为他们无法满足文书工作要求。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240104/Most-people-dropped-in-Medicaid-e28098unwindinge28099-never-tried-to-renew-coverage-Utah-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240104/Most-people-dropped-in-Medicaid-e28098unwindinge28099-never-tried-to-renew-coverage-Utah-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=86f3d066-cbee-430d-b94e-9d38648060ae Thu, 04 Jan 2024 22:03:27 -0500 Most people dropped in Medicaid ‘unwinding’ never tried to renew coverage, Utah finds
抗 CTLA-4 纳米抗体为癌症免疫治疗中预防结肠炎提供了有前景的策略一项新的研究表明，在 CTLA-4 阻断后，微生物群反应性 T 细胞会在含有野生小鼠微生物群的小鼠中引发结肠炎，该研究揭示了抗 CTLA-4 抗体在抗肿瘤免疫检查点抑制剂治疗期间诱导炎症毒性的主要机制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240104/Anti-CTLA-4-nanobodies-offer-promising-strategy-to-prevent-colitis-in-cancer-immunotherapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240104/Anti-CTLA-4-nanobodies-offer-promising-strategy-to-prevent-colitis-in-cancer-immunotherapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e9d21838-5c6d-46e2-ad7b-4abc68d976ef Thu, 04 Jan 2024 22:01:47 -0500 Anti-CTLA-4 nanobodies offer promising strategy to prevent colitis in cancer immunotherapy
屏幕时间真的是孩子绘画技巧差的罪魁祸首吗？研究发现，法国儿童观看屏幕和绘画能力之间的联系受到社会经济因素的影响，而不是屏幕时间和认知发展之间的直接因果关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240104/Is-screen-time-really-to-blame-for-poor-drawing-skills-in-kids.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240104/Is-screen-time-really-to-blame-for-poor-drawing-skills-in-kids.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ebb65951-162a-4d38-aa7b-05c1b5f4a3b4 Thu, 04 Jan 2024 21:51:00 -0500 Is screen time really to blame for poor drawing skills in kids?
研究人员发现 PPFIA3 基因是导致以前未知的综合征性神经发育障碍的原因这是一项由博士后科学家 Maimuna Paul 博士和儿童神经学家 Hsiao-Tuan Chao 博士领导的一项国际合作研究。德克萨斯儿童医院研究所 (Duncan NRI) 以及罗伯特和贾尼斯麦克奈尔基金会麦克奈尔医学研究所的一名研究人员最近发现，PPFIA3 基因的变异会导致一种以前未知的综合征性神经发育障碍。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240104/Researchers-discover-PPFIA3-gene-as-a-cause-of-previously-unknown-syndromic-neurodevelopmental-disorder.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240104/Researchers-discover-PPFIA3-gene-as-a-cause-of-previously-unknown-syndromic-neurodevelopmental-disorder.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2d101866-68e0-46ad-8d54-d78c62e847ef Thu, 04 Jan 2024 21:50:50 -0500 Researchers discover PPFIA3 gene as a cause of previously unknown syndromic neurodevelopmental disorder
南加州大学科学家开发出第一个具有功能神经元的小脑全人脑类器官模型干细胞生物学和再生医学助理教授 Giorgia Quadrato 的实验室开创了南加州大学干细胞科学家的先河，开创了一种新型人脑类器官模型，该模型可生成小脑（主要是后脑区域）的所有主要细胞类型。运动、认知和情感所需的两种细胞类型：颗粒细胞和浦肯野神经元。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240104/USC-scientists-develop-first-all- human-brain-organoids-model-of-the-cerebellum-with-function-neurons.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240104/USC-scientists-develop-first-all- human-brain-organoids-model-of-the-cerebellum-with-function-neurons.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c3f21444-dc68-49ac-b2b8-b304664a00f1 Thu, 04 Jan 2024 21:40:51 -0500 USC scientists develop first all-human brain organoids model of the cerebellum with functional neurons
